episodes.title: Arnab's Straight Questions to Hardeep Singh Puri on Epstein Files
episodes.description:
Arnab's Straight Questions to Hardeep Singh Puri on Epstein Files

Union Minister Hardeep Singh Puri strongly defends himself on the Epstein files controversy. Puri denies any role in introducing Anil Ambani and reveals he sent Rahul Gandhi a detailed note explaining the context before the allegations—yet believes it wasn't read. Puri says Rahul "needs help," calls the attacks buffoonery and smear politics. Facts over fiction—watch the full breakdown!

episodes.title: LIVE: Hardeep Puri Unfiltered With Arnab On Epstein Files, Emails | The Most Explosive Interview
episodes.description:
LIVE: Hardeep Puri Unfiltered With Arnab On Epstein Files, Emails | The Most Explosive Interview

LIVE: Hardeep Puri Unfiltered With Arnab On Epstein Files, Emails delivers the most explosive interview, as Union Minister Hardeep Singh Puri faces Arnab Goswami's rapid-fire on his 163 mentions in Jeffrey Epstein's DOJ-released files, slamming opposition "blackmail" narratives as desperate Congress hitjobs. Puri owns up to max four professional meets from 2009-2017 New York diplomacy days—feeling "uneasy" from the first—plus one key email facilitating LinkedIn founder Reid Hoffman's Digital India pitch, raging: "I've dealt with terrorists like Prabhakaran; does that make me one?" No ties to Epstein's crimes, just "Make in India" networking—watch Puri dismantle smears live.

Arnab probes email specifics like "assist/facilitate Reid's visit" from June 2014, as Puri scoffs at Rahul Gandhi's resignation calls, exposing selective leaks ignoring 3 million public docs while boasting zero involvement in pedophile island fantasies. From delegation chats to rejecting Epstein's boasts, Puri flips the script on "two-faced" jabs, vowing no defense needed for clean diplomacy amid Modi govt triumphs.
​

episodes.title: Rahul Gandhi raises the Epstein Files Issue in The Lok Sabha, Chair Disallows Him
episodes.description:
Rahul Gandhi raises the Epstein Files Issue in The Lok Sabha, Chair Disallows Him 

During a Lok Sabha session, Leader of Opposition Rahul Gandhi referenced the Jeffrey Epstein files in his address, claiming they revealed purported connections between the late financier and industrialist Anil Ambani. Ruling party members immediately protested, prompting the Speaker to intervene and rule that Gandhi could not discuss matters unrelated to the ongoing Budget debate.

episodes.title: Epstein Files News Live Update: Survivor Speaks Out, Says “Never Met Epstein’s Partner”
episodes.description:
A survivor tied to the Epstein case has come forward, claiming she never met Epstein’s alleged accomplice, Ghislaine Maxwell. As unsealed Epstein files dominate headlines globally, fresh contradictions and revelations continue to emerge.  

Republic brings you LIVE coverage and expert analysis on what this could mean for the ongoing investigation, the credibility of testimonies, and public reaction to the explosive documents released by the U.S. Justice Department.

episodes.title: Trump Vanishes From Epstein Files After Brief Cameo | US Department Of Justice Removes 16 Documents
episodes.description:
Trump Vanishes From Epstein Files After Brief Cameo | US Department Of Justice Removes 16 Documents

The US Department of Justice's December 19, 2025, release of thousands of Jeffrey Epstein files spotlighted former President Bill Clinton with multiple photos, including a redacted hot tub image and group shots with Ghislaine Maxwell, Mick Jagger, and Kevin Spacey, confirming their past associations but yielding no new allegations against him. Trump's appearances are minimal—a novelty check in Epstein's drawer and a redacted photo with Melania and Maxwell—dismissing the files as "no big deal" amid his administration's promise of full transparency under the Epstein Files Transparency Act. Experts like Mike Sisak noted context matters, as names often appear innocently, but the release's 680 entirely blacked-out pages and 119 fully redacted files have ignited outrage.

Within hours, at least 16 documents vanished from the DOJ website, including Trump's drawer photo, sparking Democrat accusations of a cover-up to protect allies, with calls for impeachment of AG Pam Bondi and Deputy Todd Blanche. Survivor Marina Lacerda decried the redactions as failing victims, demanding the unmasking of predators over elite embarrassment. Attorney John Day warned that the bipartisan Epstein network, Clinton Democrats, Trump Republicans, could turn partisan, with suspicions that redactions shield reputations, not just identities, as the saga demands true accountability.

#EpsteinFiles #TrumpEpstein #TrumpWithEpstein #Trump #EpsteinNewlyReleasedFiles #DepartmentOfJustice #JeffreyEpstein #EpsteinIsland #EpsteinFilesBlackedOut #EpsteinSuvivor #EpsteinPhotos #EpsteinFilesReleased #RepublicWorld #RepublicTV #BreakingNews #RepublicNews #IndiaNews #LiveNews #RepublicExclusive #RepublicWorldLive  #ArnabGoswami #RepublicDigital #NationFirst

episodes.title: Prince Andrew Stripped Of All Royal Titles Following Devastating Epstein Scandal | Virginia Giuffre
episodes.description:
Prince Andrew Stripped Of All Royal Titles Following Devastating Epstein Scandal | Virginia Giuffre

The downfall of Andrew, once a prince and born into a life of royal privilege as the son of the late Queen Elizabeth II, was finalized on Thursday. His brother, King Charles III, decided to take away all his titles. This marks a shameful end for Andrew, who had appeared to enjoy his connections with convicted US sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
